tool_description: Analyzes app features and content against current App Store and Google Play review guidelines to identify potential rejection risks.

features_list.description: List of app features and functionalities

content_types.description: Types of content the app handles

uses_payments.description: Whether app includes in-app purchases or payments

error_messages: Invalid category: App category must be valid for specified platforms.
Feature list empty: At least one feature must be specified.
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
Invalid audience: Target audience must be one of: children, teen, general, mature.
Content type required: At least one content type must be specified.
usage: Provide app_category, features_list, content_types, and target_platforms. Optionally specify permission usage and target_audience. Tool analyzes against current review guidelines.

risk_level.description: Overall rejection risk: low, medium, high, or critical

recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to address identified risks
